english.segment1: Tell me have you ever been. On the outside looking in. Well it's a cold and lonely place. Out from under heaven's grace
english.segment2: Did you ever wonder why. Or did it ever make you cry. Tears of joy when you found out. What his love is all about
english.segment3: It's the water tha ti need. It's the air that my heart breathes. And I have come to realize. Love is keeping me alive
english.segment4: In the shelter of your arms I've found. The center of your love is where I'm free
english.segment5: Chorus: And I just want to be in the center of your love. Yeah that's all I'm thinking of. Whoa I just want to know. How your love is with me everywhere. Your love is with me everywhere I go. (everywhere I go)
english.segment6: There is nothing I can see. That the world can offer me. What could possible compare. To your tender, loving care
english.segment7: You're the only one I've found. Who can make my world go 'round. 'cause it's only at your side. Where there's meaning in my life
english.segment8: All that's in this world has let me down. But you are all that matters to me
english.segment10: Int he shelter of your arms I've found. The center of your love is where I'm free
english.segment12: Chorus: I jsut want to be in the center of your love. Yeah that's all I'm dreamingof. Whoa I just want to know. How your love is with me everywhere. Your love is with me everywhere I go. (everywhere I go)
